creator: DoSho
title: WIP - 3D Total "The Lost Jungle" Entry
description: This project is a work-in-progress entry for the 3D Total "The Lost Jungle" competition. It involves creating a base mesh using ZSpheres in ZBrush 3.5 on a DIY Cintiq, with Undo and Adaptive Skin Preview mapped to the Intuos4 Express Keys.
steps: Create a base mesh from ZSpheres in ZBrush 3.5.
Use a DIY Cintiq for sculpting and modeling.
Map Undo and Adaptive Skin Preview functions to the Intuos4 Express Keys for efficient workflow.
